title: MOOC for information literacy competency development in the digital age

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Tool Proficiency and Information Search Experience
context.additional_context: A course for office/administrative workers to practice information evaluation, utilization, and ethical use in simulation/VR environments. Focuses on providing tools for teachers to support the learning process

learning_goals: Learners will evaluate the credibility of diverse digital sources with over 80% accuracy.
Learners will distinguish fake news from fact-based information using over five criteria through VR simulations.
Learners will enhance information literacy by performing peer evaluations and feedback at least three times using collaboration tools in MOOCs.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
